Gesper: In some way, yes. We and the Autobots have a common ancestor. 
He was Gamma, the founder of our faction, some times before the Great 
War. He had been an Autobot, but decided to part ways with them 
because he thought Cybertron's preservation against the inner enemies 
was more important than faction Wars. However, we have linked 
ourselves to the Matrix in another way. Gamma's archives helped us 
find it, but it is us who adopted it.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Pacifix was now riding along the ridge in the ocean, connecting the
> island they were on to the main continent, flushing through the rock 
and
> coral formations, trying not to dammage any if possible. 
"Fascinating.
> Of course being Autobots, we know exactly how important the Matrix 
is,
> as it is the corner stone of our society. But tell me, you must have
> some kind of connection with ancient Autobots to be so close to the
> matrix."
